channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 自阿里尔-亨利（Ariel Henry）总理因谋杀案上台以来，海地的动荡局势愈演愈烈。他说他要辞职。接下来会发生什么？
item.description:
The turmoil in Haiti has accelerated since a murder brought Prime Minister Ariel Henry to power. He says he's resigning. What's next? https://t.co/wRgS0S1Yw0

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 安哥拉政府正准备出售外币债券，以缓解这个产油国的本币压力
item.description:
Angola’s government is preparing the sale of foreign currency bonds as the oil-producing nation tries to ease the pressure on the local currency https://t.co/YE7UwIb8Qz

item.description:

item.title: 埃马纽埃尔-马克龙一直以极右翼的解毒剂自居。但随着玛丽娜-勒庞比以往任何时候都更接近总统宝座，这位亲商界的总统在 2027 年任期结束时还能留下什么呢？
item.description:
Emmanuel Macron s'est toujours présenté comme l'antidote à l'extrême droite. Mais avec une Marine Le Pen qui n'a jamais été aussi proche de ravir la présidence, que restera-t-il de l'héritage du président pro-business à la fin de son mandat, en 2027 ? https://t.co/qTKwfwnzRg

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

Signa Unit Offers Creditors 30% of Their Money Back in Plan https://t.co/CqdBhlaqOV

item.title: 武装人员在距离索马里海岸约 600 英里处登上了一艘商品船，这是该地区海盗活动死灰复燃的最新事件
item.description:
Armed men boarded a commodity ship about 600 miles off the coast of Somalia, the latest incident in a resurgence of piracy in the region https://t.co/9DYxiCBEqQ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 在以太坊网络的最新软件升级之后，使用世界上商业上最成功的区块链生态系统将变得更加便宜。

item.title: 长岛海滨小镇汉普顿（Hamptons）深受华尔街精英和度假者的青睐，这里的房地产经纪人正准备迎接销售旺季的到来。

Real estate agents in the Hamptons, the Long Island beach towns popular with Wall Street elites and vacationers alike, are bracing for a brisk sales season. https://t.co/5wpPbTXULF

item.title: 韩国当局正在调查该国石脑油（一种重要的塑料制造原料）的出口情况，重点是俄罗斯的供应情况
item.description:
Authorities in South Korea are investigating the country's exports of naphtha -- a key plastics-making ingredient -- with a particular focus on supply from Russia https://t.co/4ox6E4VxHv

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 摩根大通的凯利表示，即使在今天的 CPI 数据公布后，华尔街仍将获得它想要的降息政策
item.description:
Wall Street will get the rate cuts it wants even after today's CPI data, JPMorgan's Kelly says https://t.co/u18AKJbAFo

item.title: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）、纽约梅隆银行（BNY Mellon）、Cboe 和其他几家公司完成了一系列连接不同银行和金融机构的区块链网络试点测试，这是资本市场最大规模的此类实验之一。
item.description:
Goldman Sachs, BNY Mellon, Cboe and several other firms completed a series of pilot tests on a blockchain network that connects different banks and financial institutions, in one of the largest-scale of such experiments in capital markets https://t.co/nxSoHvjYHr

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 纽约社区银行（New York Community Bancorp）完成了一项交易，通过由美国前财政部长史蒂文-姆努钦（Steven Mnuchin）领导的支持者进行股权投资，筹集了超过 10 亿美元的资金。
item.description:
New York Community Bancorp completed a deal to raise more than $1 billion of capital through an equity investment by backers led by former US Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin. https://t.co/qBxdjI6iUf

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 仔细观察德国股市的涨幅就会发现，今年近 90% 的涨幅可归功于五家公司
item.description:
Closer inspection of Germany's stock market gains reveals that almost 90% of this year’s gains can be attributed to five companies https://t.co/A2wzbEonVY

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 阿根廷央行没有为政府本周出售的比索债券提供看跌期权，此举阻碍了私人银行参与创纪录的债务置换交易。
item.description:
Argentina’s central bank isn’t offering put options for peso bonds the government is selling this week in a record debt swap, a move that’s discouraged private banks from participating in the deal https://t.co/snhA4rvf0x

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 随着数十亿比特币产品的退出，Grayscale 打算推出全球最大比特币基金的克隆版。
item.description:
Grayscale intends to launch a clone of the world’s biggest Bitcoin fund as billions exit the product. https://t.co/pThpkxrUf3

item.title: 由于交易商在消化一份关键的美国通胀报告，以寻找美联储何时可能开始降息的迹象，黄金收窄了早些时候的跌幅。
item.description:
Gold pared earlier losses as traders digested a key US inflation report for indications of when the Federal Reserve may start cutting interest rates. https://t.co/2tqbllxJUu

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 衡量美国住房通胀的一个关键指标在 2 月份有所放缓，显然解决了前一个月令分析师困惑的脱节问题。
item.description:
A key measure of US shelter inflation moderated in February, apparently resolving a disconnect that puzzled analysts the month before. https://t.co/bJGEkGQshX

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 最新的 "不冷不热 "的英国工资数据表明，持续回归 "旧常态"--即 2008 年以前的实际工资增长和实际利率为正值的时代--可能指日可待。但愿如此。
item.description:
The latest "not too hot, not too cold" data on UK wages suggests that a sustained return to the "old normal" - the pre-2008 era of rising real wages and positive real interest rates - might just be on the cards. Let's hope so. https://t.co/7C0P4klpQi

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 欧佩克（OPEC）最新的石油供应削减计划停滞不前，原因是经常藐视该组织协议的伊拉克连续第二个月产量超过配额。
item.description:
OPEC’s latest oil supply cuts stalled as Iraq — which has often flouted the group’s agreements — produced above its quota for a second month. https://t.co/1vWfielgQz

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 家得宝正在扩大其营销力度，与 NCAA 签订一项为期三年的协议，该协议将从今年的 "疯狂三月 "锦标赛开始执行。
item.description:
Home Depot is expanding its marketing efforts with a three-year NCAA deal that will be timed to begin with this year’s March Madness tournament https://t.co/sHIQfz1uyf

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 现在直播：今天是#CPI日！@JonathanJLevin 与 Stephanie Roth (@srr1313) 和 @karlbykarlsmith 一起分析数据。

item.title: 在弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）准备就任新一届总统之际，俄罗斯紧张的精英们正在争夺位置，决心继续他在乌克兰的战争。
item.description:
Russia's nervous elite is jostling for position as Vladimir Putin prepares for his new term as president, determined to pursue his war in Ukraine https://t.co/flD16wKcVt

item.description:
Zimbabwe warned that farmland planted with corn has shrunk by 12% because of scorching El Niño weather patterns https://t.co/0lnZRbIM9i

item.title: 美国 2 月份的基本通胀率连续第二个月高于预期，从而强化了美联储对降息的谨慎态度。

Underlying US inflation topped forecasts for a second month in February, reinforcing the Federal Reserve’s cautious approach to cutting interest rates. https://t.co/O8kbUMATuA

item.title: @WTBClowes 写道："追踪黄金生产商的基金表现平平，但如果金银价格持续创新高，情况可能会有所改观。
item.description:
Funds tracking gold producers are stubbornly flat, but that may change if bullion prices hold on to record highs, writes @WTBClowes https://t.co/hnfaeovvZD

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024

item.title: 英国央行利率制定者凯瑟琳-曼（Catherine Mann）表示，英国落后的投资水平令人 "担忧"，英国经济在很大程度上依赖于少数大公司带来的资金。
item.description:
Bank of England rate-setter Catherine Mann says that Britain’s lagging investment levels are a “concern” and that the economy is heavily reliant on a small pool of large companies to bring in money https://t.co/rEq64ERZh5

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 12, 2024
